===Verb===
{{zh-verb}}

# to [[succeed]]; to [[achieve]] [[success]]
#: {{zh-x|雖然 我們 不敢 說 你 一定 會 成功 ，但是 也 絕對 沒有 人 敢 說 你 一定 不會 成功！|Though we dare not say you'll definitely '''succeed''', no one would dare say you definitely won't!}}
# {{lb|zh|literary}} to [[complete]] a [[task]]
#* {{zh-x|東 漸 于 海，西 被 于 流沙，朔 南 暨 聲教 訖 于 四海。禹 錫 玄圭，告 厥 '''成功'''。|On the east, reaching to the sea; on the west, extending to the moving sands; to the utmost limits of the north and south - his fame and influence filled up (all within) the four seas. Yu presented the dark-coloured symbol of his rank, and announced the '''completion of''' his '''work'''.|CL|ref=Shangshu}}
# {{lb|zh|literary}} to [[gather]] in the [[crop]]s; to [[harvest]]
# {{lb|zh|literary}} to [[agree]]; to [[allow]]; to [[permit]]

===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# success; [[prosperity]]
#: {{zh-x|沒有 成功，哪 來 的 幸福？|How can one be happy without '''success'''?}}
#: {{zh-x|失敗 乃 成功 之 母。|Failure is the mother of '''success'''. (proverb)}}
#: {{zh-x|最後，預祝 大會 獲得 圓滿 成功！|To conclude, I wish the conference a great '''success'''!}}
# {{lb|zh|literary}} [[achievement]]s; [[exploit]]s; [[deed]]s
# {{lb|zh|literary}} [[effect]]; [[outcome]]

===Adjective===
{{zh-adj}}

# [[successful]]
#: {{zh-x|一 個 很 成功 的 人|a very '''successful''' person}}

===Adverb===
{{zh-adv}}

# [[successfully]]
#: {{zh-x|他 成功 獲得 ^哈佛 大學 獎學金，前往 ^美國 深造。|He '''successfully''' gained a scholarship from the Harvard University, and went to the US to further his studies.}}
